taskDescription: In July, the average temperature in Madrid is 16.7 째C. The average temperature in Toronto in July is 57.4 째F. Which city has the higher temperature, and by how many degrees Celsius?
detailedSolution: Since Toronto has a temperature of 14.1 째C, Madrid has the higher temperature by 2.6 째C.
